title: Ben Higgins on Why Peter 'Can't Catch a Break'
description:
Former Bachelor Ben Higgins joins Rachel and Becca to give his take on Peter's drama-filled season. Ben discusses why the drama is preventing us (and Peter) from getting to know the women this season. Plus, why Ben believes handling conflict is not Peter's strong suit.

And, Ben reveals who his pick would have been if he were the Bachelor this season.

Don't forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
